ygData.subject: Re: info
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya, The best way I ve found to take a picture of yourself is to go to an indoor zone and hit the F9 key. This changes the camera angle & when inside
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya,<br><br>The best way I've found to take a
picture of yourself is to go to an indoor zone and hit
the F9 key. This changes the camera angle & when
inside an area with tight walls & cieling, the angles
zoom in closer. Then hit the - (minus) key on your
keypad to take the snapshot. The file is stored as a
picture file in the Everquest directory on your hard
drive.<br><br>As for fletching, check out the following
links:<br><br>Aolna's Fletching guide has everything you need to know
<a href=http://members.bellatlantic.net/~ewj/fletchguide/index.htm target=new>http://members.bellatlantic.net/~ewj/fletchguide/index.htm</a><br><br>Download the Ranger Reference, it has a small chart on how
to bring up your fletching skill for the least
amount of
$<br><a href=http://members.bellatlantic.net/~ewj/fletchguide/index.htm target=new>http://members.bellatlantic.net/~ewj/fletchguide/index.htm</a><br><br>Hope this helps.<br><br>Tetzu<br>Morell-Thule
